text: Turkish Women's Second League match between Akdeniz Nurçelik Spor (black/red) and Osmaniye Kadın Spor (green/yellow) in the 2018–19 season. The Turkish Women's Second Football League () is the second league competition for women's association football in Turkey. ==Format== == Teams promoted to Women's First League == {| class="wikitable" |- style="background-color:#ABCDEF" !Season !Teams |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2008–09 | Marmara Üniversitesi Spor, Ataşehir Belediyespor, Antalyaspor, Adana İdmanyurduspor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2009–10 |Düvenciler Lisesispor, Gölcükspor, Yalıspor, Trabzon İdmanocağı |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2010–11 |Kdz. Ereğlispor, Mersin Camspor, Çamlıcaspor, İzmit Belediyespor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2011–12 |Derince Belediyespor, Eskişehirspor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2012–13 |İzmit Çenesuyu Plajyoluspor, Marmara Üniversitesi Spor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2013–14 |Eskişehirspor, Gazikentspor, İlkadım Belediyesi Yabancılar Pazarı Spor, Karşıyaka BESEM Spor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2014–15 |1207 Antalya Muratpaşa Belediye Spor, Kireçburnu Spor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2015–16 |Beşiktaş J.K., Amasya Eğitim Spor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2016–17 | Fatih Vatan Spor, Amed SFK |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2017–18 | ALG Spor, Hakkarigücü Spor |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2018–19 | Adana İdmanyurduspor, Fomget Gençlik ve Spor, Kocaeli Bayan FK |- align="left" valign="top" bgcolor="#ffffff" ! 2019–20 |İlkadım Belediyesi Yabancılar Pazarı Spor, Dudullu Spor, 1207 Antalya Spor, Kayseri Gençler Birliği |} ==Format== As of 2016-17 Season, 14 teams compete for promoting to 1st League. They were divided into two groups according to their geographical location. In each group, teams play against each other home-and-away in a round-robin format. The group winners and runners-up advance to the promotion group, bottom two teams of each group enter the relegation group. Both promotion and relegation groups consists 4 teams and teams play against each other as in the first stage. Top two team of the promotion group qualify for the 1st League, last two team of the relegation group relegated to the Turkish Women's Third Football League. ==2019–20 season== The 2019-20 Turkish Women's Second Football League consisted of 13 teams. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Team !! Hometown |- | 1207 Antalya Spor ||Antalya, Döşemealtı |- | 1955 Batman Belediye Spor ||Batman |- | 7 Eylül Gençlik Spor ||Aydın |- | Akdeniz Nurçelikspor ||Istanbul, Küçükçekmece |- | Akasaray Hasandağı Spor ||Aksaray |- | Dudullu Spor ||Istanbul, Ümraniye |- | Gazikentspor || Gaziantep |- | İlkadım Belediyesi Spor ||Samsun, İlkadım |- | Kayseri Gençlik Birliği ||Kayseri |- | Nusaybin Gençlik Spor ||Mardin, Nusaybin |- | Osmaniye Kadın Spor ||Osmaniye |- | Sivas Gazi Lisesi Spor ||Sivas |- | Trabzon İdmanocağı ||Trabzon |} On 13 July 2020, the Turkish Football Federation (TFF)'s Board of Women's Leagues announced following regulation: :"Regarding the 2019-2020 Women's Football Leagues Özge Kanbay Season, which was decided at the meeting of the TFF Board of Directors dated 8 July 2020 not to be played due to the outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic in Turkey, the registration format should be applied as follows: ::a) Registration of the 2019-2020 Season Women's Second League is according to the current point order on the date of the decision not to play, ::b) No champion team is declared in the 2019-2020 Season Women's Second League, ::c) No relegation from the 2019-2020 Season Women's Second League to the lower league will occur, except any team, which was imposed a relegation penalty by the "Amateur Football Discipline Board" /AFDK), ::d) Four teams of the 2019-2020 season of the Women's Second League will be promoted to the 2020-2021 Women's First League. Promoted teams will be determined by the average point, which is the earned point divided by the number of matches played, ::e) According to this, İlkadım Belediyesi Yabancılar Pazarı Spor, Dudullu Spor, 1207 Antalya Spor and Kayseri Gençler Birliği are promoted to the Women's First League, ::f) No awards for the champion, second or third placed teams will be given in the 2019-2020 season." ==See also== * Women's football in Turkey * Turkish Women's First Football League * Turkish Women's Third Football League *List of women's football clubs in Turkey *Turkish women in sports == References == == External links == * Official Site of the Turkish Football Federation Category:Sports leagues established in 2008 Second Tur Football Category:Professional sports leagues in Turkey
title: Turkish Women's Second Football League
